Package au.com.formis.springbootdemo

Class MotorVehicleController

java.lang.Object
au.com.formis.springbootdemo.MotorVehicleController
@RestController public class MotorVehicleController extends Object
Since:
0.1

Version:
0.1

A controller class to process REST API requests for MotorVehicle data.

The context root mapping for the REST API is /motorVehicles followed by Get query parameters. Query parameter permutations are mapped to the JPQL queries defined in MotorVehicleRepository.

Currently the response publisher and payloadDescription string class variables hold hard wired strings as this is just a demo.

The controller uses Spring field injection for the MotorVehicleRepository interface using the @Autowired annotation.

#TODO: Resolve field injection is not recommended warning.

Author:
Peter Debus
See Also:
MotorVehicleRepository, MotorVehicle, ApiResponsePayload, org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation

  • Method Details

    • motorVehicleNoParams

      @RequestMapping(value="/motorVehicles", method=GET) public ApiResponsePayload<MotorVehicle> motorVehicleNoParams​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

      Controller for /motorVehicles when no query parameters are defined, returns and empty payload with http error 405 to avoid dumping entire database.

      Parameters:
      request - Request object for REST API query, used to fetch original URL.
      response - Response object for API response, used to see http error code 405.
      Returns:
      ApiResponsePayload containing response JSON metadata and empty List.

    • motorVehicleMake

      @RequestMapping(value="/motorVehicles", params="make", method=GET) public ApiResponsePayload<MotorVehicle> motorVehicleMake​(@RequestParam("make") String make, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      Controller for /motorVehicles with only the make query parameter defined.

      Parameters:
      make - The make REST query parameter.
      request - Request object for REST API query, used to fetch original URL.
      Returns:
      ApiResponsePayload containing response JSON metadata and List of MotorVehicle entities.

    • motorVehicleMakeAndModel

      @RequestMapping(value="/motorVehicles", params={"make","model"}, method=GET) public ApiResponsePayload<MotorVehicle> motorVehicleMakeAndModel​(@RequestParam("make") String make, @RequestParam("model") String model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      Controller for /motorVehicles with the make AND model query parameters defined.

      Parameters:
      make - The make REST query parameter.
      model - The model REST query parameter.
      request - Request object for REST API query, used to fetch original URL.
      Returns:
      ApiResponsePayload containing response JSON metadata and List of MotorVehicle entities.

    • motorVehicleMakeAndModelAndGeneration

      @RequestMapping(value="/motorVehicles", params={"make","model","generation"}, method=GET) public ApiResponsePayload<MotorVehicle> motorVehicleMakeAndModelAndGeneration​(@RequestParam("make") String make, @RequestParam("model") String model, @RequestParam("generation") String generation, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      Controller for /motorVehicles with the make AND model AND generation query parameters defined. The generation value is used as a 'contains' case insensitive match when performing the query while make and model use strict equality in the query.

      Parameters:
      make - The make REST query parameter.
      model - The model REST query parameter.
      generation - The generation REST query parameter.
      request - Request object for REST API query, used to fetch original URL.
      Returns:
      ApiResponsePayload containing response JSON metadata and List of MotorVehicle entities.
